attributes.action: Make Prince William next in line to the Throne.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see Charles step aside and let Prince William take the Throne when his Grandmother passes away. I know the Monarch normally chooses the Prime Minister but it would be nice if you could put this across to the Royals at your next Meeting with Her Maj..

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
